title.rendered: Advanced Instagram Marketing Course by JARVEE. It’s FREE!

content.rendered:
After years of experience, months of research and endless days of continuous work, we’re happy to announce our first, most advanced Instagram Marketing Course: Instagram Authority by JARVEE! It encapsulates all our tried and tested methods of growing your Instagram accounts 10 times faster and getting just as many real and engaged customers for your business.

As a Social Media Marketing professional you might be well-aware about the constant need of being relevant and on top of your game in this ever-changing social media landscape. The importance of a social media presence needs no further debate. In this day and age, everyone and his brother is on at least one social media platform and your business should be right there along with your customers – current or potential.

However, being proficient in this domain can be tricky because of the nature of this fast-paced, ever-changing medium. That’s why we created one of the best Instagram Marketing courses and certificate programs – to give you all the equipment you need to end up on top of your field, to master the art of Instagram Marketing and use it to put your company on a map and make it beloved by your customers in a matter of months, even days.

Meet Instagram Authority by JARVEE

In 8 chapters and over 70 lessons you will learn everything there is to know on how to become successful on Instagram, starting from setting up your account to creating the best possible strategy for your business. You will learn cutting edge tactics of growing your accounts at an incredible speed and upon completion of this course, you will receive a Certification that comes as a stamp of expertise one can display on their resume.

With this course, you will build a solid foundation for social media marketing and learn advanced tactics that will put you ahead of your peers and competitors. Having this course under your belt it’s a true competitive advantage. You will grow your Instagram accounts faster with tactics only the elite social marketers use.

And the best part is: it’s 100% FREE! Our aim is to give our customers the best possible tools to succeed in Instagram Marketing and take their business to the next level. That’s why we decided to make this advanced Instagram course available for free and give you the best possible gift – the gift of knowledge!

The lessons are created and continuously updated by the JARVEE team – a team of young professionals that accumulated years of experience from growing their own accounts and businesses and from helping small business owners double or triple their revenues using social media.

If this introduction raised your interest, you can see a course preview right here.

Here is an overview of all the chapters and lessons in this Advanced Instagram Marketing course brought to you for FREE by JARVEE:

#1 Getting Acquainted

  • Setting Up An Account
  • Choosing The Right Username
  • Picking The Perfect Profile Picture
  • Attractive Bio For The Win
  • Extra Bio Options For Business Accounts
  • Bio Link Best Practices
  • Chapter 1 Halfway Quiz
  • Tracking Your Bio Link
  • Your Account Settings
  • The Need For A Landing Page
  • IG Blocks And Security Checks
  • Actions You Can Do On Instagram
  • Chapter 1 Closing Quiz

#2 Content Creation Master Plan

  • Your First 10 – 20 Instagram Posts
  • Guidelines for Creating Good Content
  • Apps For Creating Great Photos
  • Finding High Quality Images
  • Chapter 2 Halfway Quiz
  • The Power of User-Generated Content
  • How to Maintain a Healthy Engagement Rate
  • Setting Up a Product Push on Instagram
  • The Power of Video Content
  • Chapter 2 Closing Quiz

#3 Posting Strategies

  • Consistent posting is key
  • Creating catchy captions
  • Hashtag research
  • Posting with hashtags
  • Chapter 3 Halfway Quiz
  • Tagging & mentioning best practices
  • Best posting times
  • Scheduling your IG posts
  • Chapter 3 Closing Quiz

#4 Growth Hacks

  • Giveaways Strategy
  • Follow – Unfollow Strategy
  • Liking Strategy
  • Commenting Strategy
  • The power of DMs
  • The Power of Instagram Stories
  • Chapter 4 Closing Quiz

#5 Influencer Marketing

  • The Power of Influencer Marketing
  • Shoutout for Shoutout (S4S) Strategy
  • Product/Service for Post
  • How To Work With Influencers
  • Examples of Effective Shoutouts
  • Finding the Best Accounts to do S4S
  • Chapter 5 Closing Quiz

#6 Making money with IG

  • Monetization Options
  • When To Monetize & Extra Resources
  • Being an Account Manager
  • Finding Clients
  • Chapter 6 Closing Quiz

#7 Automation

  • The Importance of Instagram Automation
  • Introducing JARVEE
  • Follow – unfollow automation
  • Liking automation
  • Commenting automation
  • Chapter 7 closing quiz

#8 Protecting Your Account

  • Report Hacked Account
  • Report Copyright Infringement
  • What To Do If Your Account Gets Banned
  • How to Get Your Account Verified
